name: Stim 2 Fit
descr:
2-channel multifunction portable electrotherapy device for nerve and muscle stimulation.

This device has been specially developed for the consumer market with a descpritive brochure showing the electrode placement and a clear explanation of the 16 programs. The device is placed in an attractive box designed to appeal to sports, wellness, medical shops and shopping clientele.

The Stim 2 Fit has 16 programs divided in 4 programs groups as following: Beauty, Wellness-Regeneration-Massage, Muscle Training, Pain Therapy.
